org.apache.tephra.hbase.txprune

Class PruneUpperBoundWriter

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.google.common.util.concurrent.AbstractIdleService
      • org.apache.tephra.hbase.txprune.PruneUpperBoundWriter
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    com.google.common.util.concurrent.Service

    public class PruneUpperBoundWriter
extends com.google.common.util.concurrent.AbstractIdleService
    Thread that will write the the prune upper bound. An instance of this class should be obtained only through PruneUpperBoundWriterSupplier which will also handle the lifecycle of this instance.

    • Nested Class Summary

      • Nested classes/interfaces inherited from interface com.google.common.util.concurrent.Service
